quote: Flamenco is the cry of the soul.
author: Paco de Lucía

quote: Compás is not learned, it is felt.
author: Camarón de la Isla

quote: Flamenco is passion, love, and life.
author: Tomatito

quote: If flamenco could be explained, it would cease to be flamenco.
author: Vicente Amigo

quote: Duende cannot be studied; you are born with it.
author: Manolo Caracol

quote: Flamenco is the voice of a people, a feeling turned into art.
author: José Mercé

quote: Those who do not have compás within should not sing flamenco.
author: Antonio Mairena

quote: Singing is my way of talking to God.
author: Enrique Morente

quote: Flamenco is the blood and life of Andalusia.
author: Diego el Cigala

quote: The flamenco guitar is a heart beating in every string.
author: Sabicas
